
```{r, include=FALSE}
filep  = lineage_df$filepath[2]
lineage = clonesum_read(filep)

selection = head(lineage, n = 25) %>% dplyr::select(lineage_id, variable,top_cdr3aa,lineage_frequency,number_of_clones)
colnames(selection) = gsub("_", " ",stringr::str_to_title(colnames(selection)))
```

#### Top 25 clones
```{r}
DT::datatable(selection)
```


Top clone has `r top_freq`% frequency.
